sub_fields.label: Modal
sub_fields.name: modal
sub_fields.instructions:
Modal warning for locked post content.
Insert this content to any restricted posts/page with this shortcode: [restrict_access_argo]

sub_fields.label: Page link
sub_fields.name: page_link
sub_fields.instructions:
Click here for a menu.
*Notice: "Post" also refers to a page.

sub_fields.label: CTA
sub_fields.name: cta
sub_fields.instructions:
Should this navigation item be "call to action" type of button?
*Note: It is recommended to have only 1 CTA navigation item.

sub_fields.label: Form
sub_fields.name: form
sub_fields.instructions:
Paste form shortcode here.
Example: [fluentform id="2"]

sub_fields.name: third_level_navigation

sub_fields.label: Fetch news?
sub_fields.name: fetch_news
sub_fields.instructions: ON - Fetching news is ACTIVE/ON OFF - Fetching news is INACTIVE/OFF

sub_fields.label: Fetch daily
sub_fields.name: fetch_daily
sub_fields.instructions:
How many news should be fetched daily?
CAUTION More news = More traffic

sub_fields.label: Tags
sub_fields.name: tags
sub_fields.instructions: Pick tags for news fetching source.

sub_fields.label: Video block
sub_fields.name: video_block
sub_fields.instructions: This block provides flexibility for video block on single post page.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.default_value: Become a member to support the necessary advocacy, knowledge, and discussions for a realistic, moderate change in protecting sensible gun rights and ownership while providing the necessary legal and enforcement framework for a safer environment and a drastic reduction in needless gun violence.

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: This button is shown on video block on single post page.

choices.link_primary: Greenish blue text, no background color

sub_fields.label: Sender email (must match email from FLUENT SMTP)
sub_fields.name: sender_email

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: Morem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc vulputate libero et velit interdum, ac aliquet odio mattis.

sub_fields.label: Popup page
sub_fields.name: popup_page
sub_fields.instructions: On what page this popup should trigger?
